item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography Wen-Sheng (Vincent) Chu is a Senior Research Scientist at Google Research, dedicated to developing machine learning techniques for computer vision problems and products on mobile devices, such as shipping Face Unlock on Pixel 4. Prior to Google, he was a Deep Learning Scientist at Apple, taking a major role of algorithm development for on-device technologies, including Face ID and real-time camera features shipped with 30M+ devices (eg, X, XR, XS, XS Max) and next-gen products.

item.title: Services
item.description: Conference Chairing Area Chair (Senior PC), ACM International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2019-2020 Area Chair, IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2019 Area Chair, IEEE Conference on Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2018 Conference Review Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2014–present International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV), 2015–present European Conference on Computer Vision (ECCV), 2012–present Automatic Face and Gesture Recognition (AFGR), 2015–present Asian Conference on Compute Vision (ACCV), 2012–2014 AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI), 2016–present Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS), 2019–present International Conference on Multimodal Interaction (ICMI), 2018–present Affective Computing and Intelligent Interaction (ACII), 2015 Journal Review
